author: ALEX VEIGA and DAMIAN J. TROISE AP Business Writers
title: Stocks fall as investors brace for earnings hit from virus
description: Stocks are closing lower on Wall Street as investors brace for what is sure to be widespread damage to company earnings because of the coronavirus
content: Stocks are closing lower on Wall Street as investors brace for what is sure to be widespread damage to company earnings because of the coronavirus. Major banks and other companies will start reporting their earnings this week, including JPMorgan Chase, which … [+5489 chars]
